description.narrative:
The World Bank has requested Swedish support through an Externally Financed Output (EFO) of 18,5 million SEK and 18 months of duration to carry out the project " Functional Reviews of Education, Health, Finance, Public Service and Justice sectors" .
The intervention aims at identifying relevant elements for effective policy dialogue in the areas of deployment of state resources and support the public administration’s capacity to lead performance driven reforms in the Education, Health, Finance, Public Service and Justice sectors by 1) Conducting functional reviews of the Education, Health, Finance, Public Service and Justice sectors ; 2) Developing a change management and communication strategy; and 3) Developing a body of knowledge adapted and relevant to Burkina Faso’s specific socio-political context. The World Bank will implement the intervention together with the Government of Burkina Faso.
The total budget is 18,5 MSEK.

Världsbanken har ansökt om finansiering av 18 500 000 kronor till Sida för att genomföra projektet " Functional Reviews of Education, Health, Finance, Public Service and Justice sectors" i Burkina Faso under perioden 2019-2020.
Interventionen syftar till att identifiera relevanta delar för en effektiv politisk dialog för utnyttjande av statliga resurser, och att stödja den offentliga förvaltningens förmåga att leda prestationsbaserade reformer inom sektorerna för utbildning, hälsa, offentliga finanser, offentlig sektor och justitie genom att 1) genomföra en funktionell granskning av dessa ministerier: utbildning, hälsa, finans, offentlig sektor och rättsliga sektorn; 2) Utveckla en förändringshanterings- och kommunikationsstrategi; och 3) Utveckla en kunskapsbank som är anpassad och relevant för Burkina Fasos specifika sociopolitiska kontext. Världsbanken kommer att genomföra insatsen tillsammans med Burkina Fasos regering.
Insatsens totala budget är 18,5 miljoner kronor

The objective of the contribution is to develop analytical work and knowledge products to identify relevant elements for effective policy dialogue in the areas of deployment of state resources and support the public administration’s capacity to lead performance driven reforms. The three following activities envisioned under this contribution will articulate a multi-disciplinary and multi-stakeholder approach for a more effectiveassistance to the Government in the areas of deployment of state resources andpublic administration’s capacity: 1°) Conduct functional reviews of the Education, Health, Finance, Public Administration and Justice sectors in order to promote effective allocation and management of resources in the targeted ministries. 2°) Develop a change management and communication strategy through a change management program focused on strategic communication. 3°) Since there is a variety of actors involved in the policy reform path and implementation of human resources deployment who do not necessarily share the same understanding of the aims and means of the approach to follow, a body of knowledge adapted and relevant to Burkina Faso’s specific socio-political context will be shared, aiming at creating a common understanding amongst the actors/stakeholders.

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

tag.narrative: 16.3 - Främja rättssäkerheten på nationell och internationell nivå samt säkerställa lika tillgång till rättvisa för alla.
16.3 - Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all.
16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.

description.narrative: Regarding the result "Conduct functional reviews of the Education, Health, Finance, Public Administration and Justice sectors in order to promote effective allocation and management of resources in the targeted ministries", consultants have been contracted and preliminary functional review notes for 4 pilot ministries are being finalized. In these 4 key sectors, the following progress have been made: -the development of standardized collection and analysis tools, the production ofinterview guides and the start of data collection and interviews in the field -the nomination of focal points for the 4 target ministries and the organization in december 2020 and january 2021 of 4 sectoral workshops at the technical level to kick off the process of data collection -the adoption in march 2021 of the decree on the creation, attributions, composition, organization and functioning of the functional reviews steering mechanism. On the change management component, there is the production in February 2021 of a technical note on capacity building of reform actors to lay the groundwork for the conduct of interviews of 100 reform actors in the 4 target ministries at the forefront of change management Regarding capacity building, there are the organization of 2 webinars on the conduct of functional reviews (December 2020) and on GPEC (Gestion prévisionnelle des emplois et des compétences - forward-looking management of jobs and skills) (march 2021) for the focal points of target ministries (number trained: 30)
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
